description: head and shoulders of a woman looking outward with a furrowed brow and slight frown on her face; hair is pulled back and falls to the shoulders; background and garment is in a faded red; hair and neck area is brown; and face is beige
inscription: LL of sheet, in pencil: Mädchenkopf | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E 91-C-Steine 1 und 3 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1952
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 24
title: Woman's Head (Sonia Gramatté)
